node.title: Suppression lifts for 89-year-old charged in Lake Alice investigation
node.description: In the Whanganui District Court last week, John Richard Corkran pleaded not guilty and elected trial by jury.
node.content:
["Suppression has lifted for the 89-year-old man charged after the latest police investigation into Lake Alice psychiatric hospital.", "", "
John Richard Corkran Photo: RNZ / Nate McKinnon
", "An order keeping John Richard Corkran's name secret expired at 5pm.", "The Marton man is accused of injecting patients aged under 16 at the hospital's child and adolescent unit with paralysing drugs as punishment between 1974 and 1977.", "In the Whanganui District Court last week, Corkran pleaded not guilty and elected trial by jury.", "His case will next be called in March."]
